mng: on top, upon, above, upper, previous, first (of multiple parts), to climb, to get onto, to go up, to attend (class or university)

exm.mng: that level or higher, that amount or more, the above-mentioned
plus, to put in, to add, to add on, to add into, in addition, on top of that
Shanghai municipality, central east China, abbr. to 滬|沪[Hu4]
to go online, to put sth online
